properties.name: camel.cluster.kubernetes.attributes
properties.description: Custom service attributes.

properties.name: camel.cluster.kubernetes.cluster-labels
properties.description: Set the labels used to identify the pods composing the cluster.

properties.name: camel.cluster.kubernetes.config-map-name
properties.description: Set the name of the ConfigMap used to do optimistic locking (defaults to 'leaders').

properties.name: camel.cluster.kubernetes.connection-timeout-millis
properties.description: Connection timeout in milliseconds to use when making requests to the Kubernetes API server.

properties.name: camel.cluster.kubernetes.enabled
properties.description: Sets if the Kubernetes cluster service should be enabled or not, default is false.

properties.name: camel.cluster.kubernetes.id
properties.description: Cluster Service ID

properties.name: camel.cluster.kubernetes.jitter-factor
properties.description: A jitter factor to apply in order to prevent all pods to call Kubernetes APIs in the same instant.

properties.name: camel.cluster.kubernetes.kubernetes-namespace
properties.description: Set the name of the Kubernetes namespace containing the pods and the configmap (autodetected by default)

properties.name: camel.cluster.kubernetes.lease-duration-millis
properties.description: The default duration of the lease for the current leader.

properties.name: camel.cluster.kubernetes.master-url
properties.description: Set the URL of the Kubernetes master (read from Kubernetes client properties by default).

properties.name: camel.cluster.kubernetes.order
properties.description: Service lookup order/priority.

properties.name: camel.cluster.kubernetes.pod-name
properties.description: Set the name of the current pod (autodetected from container host name by default).

properties.name: camel.cluster.kubernetes.renew-deadline-millis
properties.description: The deadline after which the leader must stop its services because it may have lost the leadership.

properties.name: camel.cluster.kubernetes.retry-period-millis
properties.description: The time between two subsequent attempts to check and acquire the leadership. It is randomized using the jitter factor.

properties.name: camel.component.kubernetes-config-maps.autowired-enabled
properties.description: Whether autowiring is enabled. This is used for automatic autowiring options (the option must be marked as autowired) by looking up in the registry to find if there is a single instance of matching type, which then gets configured on the component. This can be used for automatic configuring JDBC data sources, JMS connection factories, AWS Clients, etc.

properties.name: camel.component.kubernetes-config-maps.bridge-error-handler
properties.description: Allows for bridging the consumer to the Camel routing Error Handler, which mean any exceptions occurred while the consumer is trying to pickup incoming messages, or the likes, will now be processed as a message and handled by the routing Error Handler. By default the consumer will use the org.apache.camel.spi.ExceptionHandler to deal with exceptions, that will be logged at WARN or ERROR level and ignored.

properties.name: camel.component.kubernetes-config-maps.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable auto configuration of the kubernetes-config-maps component. This is enabled by default.

properties.name: camel.component.kubernetes-config-maps.kubernetes-client
properties.description: To use an existing kubernetes client. The option is a io.fabric8.kubernetes.client.KubernetesClient type.

properties.name: camel.component.kubernetes-config-maps.lazy-start-producer
properties.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.
